name: Grazitti Interactive
description:
Grazitti Interactive is a global digital services provider leveraging cloud, mobile and social media technologies to reinvent the way you do business.
As a global digital innovation leader with offices in India, USA, Australia, and Singapore, we have strategic partnerships with technology pioneers like Google, Marketo, Salesforce.com, Alteryx, Adobe, Tableau, Optimizely, and Jive. 
We combine these platforms with our innovative approaches to provide effective solutions to our clients. Doing this has allowed us to help hundreds of companies to transform their business and save millions.
We have a comprehensive set of compliance certifications such as SSAE 16 SOC 1 and SOC 2 Type II Audits, ISO 27001, HIPAA, PIMS, and other attestations to validate our commitment to operational, data security, and privacy best practices.
